attributes.review: This app is horrible this app took a few days to download and it made my phone glitch and a lot of bugs on of apps and it made my best friend died Bc of it I’m so sad and it made my dog die also it also made bugs come out of my phone my house was on fire and my family is homeless I’m sad now I thought this app was good for this place but no😪 it also had bad quality sadly
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: This app was made for a terrible man a man that is supposed to help guide this country but failed he fail with black people Asian people Hispanic people do you hear me with PEOPLE you are the worst type of person you are a rapist lier a racist that the worst quality’s a person can have Lucy you aren’t a human being a human being would believe all people are equal you preach you love for god but hate people that aren’t rich white MEN
attributes.title: F you

attributes.review: this app has given me the worst luck possible, and i can’t think of any other reason why my uterus fell out of my vagina hole OTHER THAN THE FACT THAT I DOWNLOADED THIS REVOLTING APP. i went to take a dump last weekend and suddenly i felt a THUMP coming from my pelvis. i look into the toilet bowl and my UTERUS IS IN THE TOILET BOWL, not to mention MY UTERUS WAS ORANGE... sounds familiar. donald trump and his terrible app is responsible for this tragedy. will be deleting this application after review is posted 😡😡😡
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: this app is the most terrible app that i have downloaded onto my phone. it has taken months to download and when it did the only thing it played was cat videos. if i could i would have done 0 stars. i really wanted to support this beautiful cheeto, but this app makes me want to vomit. 10/10 would NOT recommend. hope you take this review seriously.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: I was on my phone and I decided I would see how good this app was when I downloaded it I couldn’t believe my eyes I was looking at pictures of an orange 😰😱😱 yes an ORANGE. Then it said vote 2020 or something I was extremely scared what if an ORANGE takes over 😖😖😖😖😖then I decided to throw my whole phone away because I couldn’t keep on having such a tragic app on my phone SO DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT luv 👁 or the orange will haunt your dreams 😢
attributes.title: Spooky spooky spooky

attributes.review: This app was so slow and didn’t let me do anything! It was so bad I had to undownload it and I’m never downloading it again. If your planning on getting this app I suggest not to. You will be highly disappointed as I was:( you would think a person with that amount of money would actually invest in a good app but no. Overall this app is absolutely trash end of story.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: so during the 3 hour time it took me to download this app, my phone started to get super hot. I was like “huh, that’s weird. I don’t know why MY president would make an app that would make my phone overheat!” after it had been about 2 and a half hours, my phone LITERALLY STARTED SPARKING??? AND THEN THE SCREEN CRACKED A BUNCH AND IT ALMOST LIT ON FIRE!! There is some MESSED UP software in this app. I am NEVER downloading a trump app EVER again. make the App Store great again!!!
attributes.title: MY PHONE EXPLODED?!??!?? NOT CLICKBAIT

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to worship our lord and save Donald Trump. The app took 7 days to download i don’t know if it’s because Trump created the world in 7 days why it took so long. Upon downloading it started to play “are you coming to the tree” out of nowhere 15 million cockroaches came into my house with knives saying “rate 5 stars or die” I ran screaming in fare thinking I would die. I escaped. 1 star
attributes.title: Roaches evicted me and my family.

attributes.review: I was so confused about all the one star reviews. I thought it must have been those good for nothing leftists!! But then I opened the app and it crashed my phone entirely!!! Now I can’t delete it and every time I try to open the screen gets all glitchy and freezes for like an hour and won’t even let me turn it off to restart. It waits until my phone dies!!!!DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: ACTUAL Trump supporter

attributes.review: This app had so many glitches and it made Jesus cry. Putting an orange on the front page was NOT the best idea. 🧚🏼✨He needs to put some chapstick on and some moisturizer✨🧚🏼. I almost got epilepsy from how bad the glitches were- that indicates health issues. How bad does an app have to be to give me health issues? Of course it’s an app from Donald Trump too. Don’t use this app if you’re a supporter of black lives matter✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: TERRIBLE. ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING
